00047 class SerializationBuffer;

00059 enum GCPlacement {
00060     UseGC, 
00061     NoGC, 
00062     PointerFreeGC 
00065 };
00066 
00077 class Object {
00078 #ifndef SYLPH_DOXYGEN
00079 public:
00080     Object();
00081     virtual ~Object();
00082     void* operator new( size_t size);
00083     void* operator new( size_t size, GCPlacement gcp);
00084     void* operator new( size_t size, void *p);
00085     void operator delete( void* obj);
00086     void operator delete( void*, GCPlacement);
00087     void operator delete( void*, void*);
00088 
00089     // Arrays from Object are *never* gc'ed, and I recommend using Sylph::Array
00090     // instead. Maybe we should document this somewhere?
00091     void* operator new[](size_t size);
00092     void* operator new[](size_t size, void *p);
00093     void operator delete[](void* obj);
00094     void operator delete[](void*, void*);
00095 
00096 private:
00097     static void cleanup(void* obj, void* clientData);
00098     static bool gc_inited;
00099 #endif
00100 public:
00106     virtual void serialize(SerializationBuffer & buf) const {}
00112     virtual void deserialize(DeserializationBuffer & buf) {}
00113 };

00124      template<class T> void deletegc(const T * t);

00126 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
